translations: 依偎（snuggle 的第三人称单数）

phrs.translation: 蔬食舒食, 东张西望, 衣物柔顺剂

sentences.sentence: She follows him around and snuggles up to him.
Wave chase wave jackdaw one right, who does girl everybody has partner and I snuggles up.
sentences.translation: 波浪追逐波浪寒鸦一对对，姑娘人人有伙伴谁和我相偎。

sentences.sentence: I blub on a regular basis at movies, books, songs, photos, novel ideas, headaches, puppy snuggles.
sentences.translation: 我经常因为电影书歌照片小说故事头痛小狗依偎而哭。
